sentences.sentence: We will walk very, very slowly, and if we feel tired we can rest by the wayside.
sentences.translation: 我们会走得非常非常慢，如果我们感到累了，我们可以在路边休息。

sentences.sentence: Amateurs fall by the wayside when the going gets tough.
sentences.translation: 初学者们遇到困难就半途而废。

sentences.sentence: My book knowledge fell by the wayside as I thought about the basics of getting around, reading emails and talking with my classmates, I was often nervous at school, worried about whether the teachers would call on me in class and whether I'd understand their questions.
sentences.translation: 我一开始思考出行、阅读电子邮件和与同学交谈时，就会把书本知识置之脑后。我在学校里时常感到紧张，担心老师会不会在课上点我，担心自己能否理解老师的问题。
